alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight; Southampton; Sussex (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 4:57PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT... NORTHERN SOUTHAMPTON AND SOUTHEASTERN SUSSEX COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM EDT... At 457 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Courtland, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, heavy rain, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Reduced visibility and minor flooding possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. Locations impacted include... Windsor, Courtland, Wakefield, Ivor, Sedley, Zuni, Capron, Vicksville, Pons, Yale, Lumberton, Worrell, Hilda, Dory, Walters, Drewryville, Story, Gray, Berlin, and Manry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
